content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court fees and legal fees for the defendant and the applicant were specified the court made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property awarding a vehicle to the applicant and ordering the defendant to give it up the legal text discusses various articles of the civil code related to property division in a matrimonial context the applicant sought a divorce retention of their surname establishment of residence for their children and modifications to the separation procedure the court determined child maintenance divided the property dissolved the marriage due to conflicts caused by alcohol addiction and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings the court also addressed the division of debts and ordered the defendant to pay the applicants legal costs both parties were required to pay amounts to the state budget

metadata.cost: 20.50 EUR (court fees) + 13.20 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant 656.00 EUR (legal fees) + 104.54 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant.
